Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on my back porch, I looked toward the northern sky and noticed red-orange objects beginning to ascend from behind the tree lines. At first, the objects appeared to be some sort of fireworks; however, the cluster began to include several of the same objects, all ascending to a particular area of the sky - just slightly north-west from where they appeared. None of the objects fell toward the ground, instead, they all ascended and subsequently faded into the perfectly clear night sky. There was no sound coming from the objects.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sandusky
There were no other sightings in Sandusky on or around March 19th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 10-20 red-orange objects ascending then fading into one general area of the northern sky.
